description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Cocktail recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Christmas Cocktail Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place juice of 1 orange and lemon and 1/2 cup caster sugar in a large bowl and stir until well combined. Stand for 20 minutes or until sugar has dissolved.

Trim 1/2 fresh watermelon, cut into thin wedges. Place in a bowl and refrigerate until required. Add 3 cups chilled watermelon water, 1 cup chilled cranberry juice, 1/2 cup Malibu and 1 bunch mint leaves to orange juice mixture, stirring until combined. Pour into tall jugs with 4 cups ice. Add 750ml chilled soda water and stir until combined. Stand melon wedges in short glasses and fill with cocktail. Serve immediately.
